com.tlabs.textparser

Class ValueDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlabs.textparser.ValueDescription

  • public class ValueDescription
extends java.lang.Object
    A value is a numeric entity, might have a constraint, a value and a unit, e.g. "max. 3000 euro"
    Author:
    burkhardt.felix

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Inner class to repersent the result and all words are were not used.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValueDescription

        public ValueDescription(java.lang.String id,
                boolean isPostfix,
                boolean isDouble)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        id - The id for the descriptor, e.g. "euro"
        isPostfix - If the unit is postfix or prefix notation, e.g. "true" for "300 euro" but "false" for "baujahr 2010"
        isDouble - If the values are doubles or integers.

    • Method Detail

      • searchValue

        public ValueDescription.ValueResult searchValue(java.lang.String test)
        Search for a value.
        Parameters:
        test - The string to test, e.g. "remeo max 200 euro black".
        Returns:
        The result and the strings not used, e.g. "max 200 euro" and "romeo black".

      • searchValue

        public ValueDescription.ValueResult searchValue(java.lang.String[] test)
        Search for a value.
        Parameters:
        test - the string array to search in.
        Returns:
        The result and the strings not used, e.g. "max 200 euro" and "romeo black".
